DistanceAttenuationCurve: A distance attenuation curve to use to attenuate the audio.
DistanceRange: A distance range over which to apply distance attenuation using the supplied curve.
AttenuationDbAtMaxRange: An attenuation, in decibels, to apply to the sound at max range.
Frequency: The frequency (in hz) of the tone generator.
Volume: The linear volume of the tone generator.

methods.name: SetFrequency
methods.doc: Sets the frequency of the tone generator

methods.name: SetVolume
methods.doc: Sets the volume of the tone generator
